I‚Äôm not a big fan of the rice they‚Äôre using or how it was cooked‚Äîit got too chewy. Sushi rice is supposed to be sticky but not laborious to eat. Torre is located on Balewadi High Street. Two wheeler and Four wheeler parking available. To my great surprise, this restaurant is located in an under construction building. Torre offers a beautifully curated dining experience that blends freshness, flavor, and finesse in equal measure. From the warm welcome to the last bite, everything reflected quality and attention to detail.

There are restaurants you visit for the thrill of the new, and then there‚Äôs Gong‚Äîwhere you return for the comforting promise of knowing it‚Äôs going to be good. I've been a loyal customer for a while now, and every visit reminds me why this Asian fine-dine has my heart.

Today‚Äôs experience? No different. I tried a bunch of their new offerings, and yet again, walked out smiling and a little more in love with the place. The avocado carpaccio was a clean, punchy start‚Äîlight, fresh, and full of those bright, zingy flavours that make you sit up straighter.

We went for birthday party of office colleague around 2pm after calling and checking with them at 1.30 pm. But to our surprise nothing was prepared and ready with them. After an hour we recieved only garlic bread and spring roll, though we were promised to get by 2.30pm. Even regular item like dal fry was getting prepared at 3pm and we can hear the whistle of cooker. Adding salt to this when we said we are leaving as it's an hour , they said ok and gave bill, so we doubt were they really preparing food in mean time. Adding masala to our experience, manager/owner went to take diesel for generator when electricity went off, so we had to sit in dark for around 15-20 mins. 1 star for effort...read more
